alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:46PM EDT until July 13 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Otsego County in central New York... Central Broome County in central New York... West central Delaware County in central New York... Southeastern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 546 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sanitaria Springs, or 10 miles northeast of Binghamton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Bainbridge, Masonville, Unadilla, Afton, Sidney Center, Rockdale, Harpursville, Mt Upton and Sanitaria Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
